entry.title: Monday: Flurries. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon then light late this afternoon. High minus 4. Wind chill minus 16 this morning and minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Becoming partly cloudy after midnight. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light late this evening. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 12 this evening and minus 21 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Monday 23 January 2023
